DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy intravitreal implant dexamethasone ( DDS-25 ) treatment macular edema associate retinal vein occlusion .
DOC.brief_title: DDS-25 Gauge Patients With Macular Edema Secondary Retinal Vein Occlusion ( RVO )
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate effect visual acuity , electroretinography , fluorescein angiography optical coherence tomography 10 patient macular edema associate retinal vein occlusion undergo intravitreal injection implant dexamethasone ( DDS-25 ) .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old macular edema result retinal vein occlusion Decrease visual acuity least one eye result macular edema ( 20/50 worse ) Visual acuity eye worse 20/200 Known anticipate need ocular surgery within next 12 month History glaucoma current high eye pressure require 1 medication Diabetic retinopathy Uncontrolled systemic disease Known steroidresponder Use systemic steroid Use warfarin/heparin
